title: inthakanna dhelpa
sahitya:
intakanna delpa taramA jagadIshvara nE nIki taramA n tO



caraNam 1



nITilOni rAjIvamurA rAma ninu nammi bratuku jIvamurA



caraNam 2



nIvE tana kihaparamu rAma ninnu nammina kApuramu



caraNam 3



ghanamunu gOru cAtakamu rIti gAciti tana hrtpAtakamu



caraNam 4



rajanIshu jUcu kumudamu rIti rAjillu ninu jUDa mudamu



caraNam 5



nI karuNa rAjayOgamu mAku nI mAyamE rAjabhOgamu



caraNam 6



rAghava shubhakara mUrtE tyAgarAju nIvAdani kIrtE
